MacSyFinder errors¶

macsypy_error API reference¶

exception macsypy.macsypy_error.MacsypyError[source]¶

The base class for MacSyFinder specific exceptions.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

exception macsypy.macsypy_error.SystemDetectionError[source]¶

Raised when the detection of systems from Hits encountered a problem.

exception macsypy.macsypy_error.SystemInconsistencyError[source]¶

Raised when a secretion system is not consistent.
